validation.INVALID_BOOLEAN: {property} field must be a boolean value
validation.MIN_LENGTH: {property} field must have at least {value} characters
validation.IS_EMAIL: {property} field must be a valid email address
validation.STRING: `{property}` must be a string; you provided {value}
validation.INVALID_EMAIL: {property} field must be a valid email address
validation.ARRAY_MIN_SIZE: {property} field must have at least {constraints.0} items
validation.IS_POSTAL_CODE: {property} must be a valid postal code
validation.IS_PHONE_NUMBER: {property} must be a valid phone number
validation.IS_MONGO_ID: {property} must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId
validation.IS_BASE32: {property} must be a valid base32 string
validation.IS_BASE64: {property} must be a valid base64 string
validation.IS_OCTAL: {property} must be a valid octal number
validation.IS_MAGNET_URI: {property} must be a valid magnet URI
validation.IS_MAC_ADDRESS: {property} must be a valid MAC address
validation.IS_BTC_ADDRESS: {property} must be a valid Bitcoin address
validation.IS_ALPHANUMERIC: {property} must contain only letters and numbers
validation.ARRAY_NOT_CONTAINS: {property} must not contain the specified values
validation.IS_FQDN: {property} must be a valid fully qualified domain name (FQDN)
validation.IS_JWT: {property} must be a valid JWT token
validation.IS_JSON: {property} must be a valid JSON string
validation.IS_CREDIT_CARD: {property} must be a valid credit card number
validation.IS_HEX_COLOR: {property} must be a valid hexadecimal color code
validation.IS_DATA_URI: {property} must be a valid data URI
validation.IS_IP: {property} must be a valid IP address
validation.IS_ENUM: {property} must be a valid enum value
